text: Amar Basu was an Indian politician. He was elected as MLA of Jhargram Vidhan Sabha Constituency in West Bengal Legislative Assembly in 2006. He died on 20 February 2019 at the age of 79. ==References== Category:2019 deaths Category:Communist Party of India (Marxist) politicians Category:West Bengal MLAs 2006–2011
title: Amar Basu
